meanings.definition: Beliefs or practices associated with voodoo.
meanings.sent1: Some people still follow ancient voodooisms in their daily lives.
meanings.sent2: The village was known for its mysterious voodooisms.
meanings.sent3: The tourist was fascinated by the voodooisms of the local culture.
meanings.sent4: Her voodooisms seemed to cast a spell on those around her.
meanings.sent5: The dark alley was filled with whispers of voodooisms.

meanings.sent1: She laughed at his silly voodooisms about black cats.
meanings.sent2: The old book was full of strange voodooisms.
meanings.sent3: His voodooisms about avoiding cracks on the sidewalk made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The voodooisms of the town spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The voodooisms of the past haunted the old mansion.
